thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.com.au
thread.title: Neville Buckley

author: Neville Buckley
title: Neville Buckley
text:
we were chasing some printed USB sticks for our small business and stumbled across Flashbay on Google, we completed the online submission along with a few others (some of which still haven't replied)
Ivan was on fire, we had a display of samples courier delivered to finalise our selection within a day or so and that is regional NSW.
We were blown away with the variety, quality and vast range of products, the labeling/printing is also first class.
We now have our Business Logo USB sticks for our clients and cannot speak highly enough of Ivan at Flashbay, always in touch, perfect communication and delivers on his commitments.
I highly recommend this company and the products that we had delivered.
Regards Nev
